ygData.subject: Re: Practice Research
ygData.msgSnippet: I have tried with paper and quill in the concordance of research and I still got the These item did not combine in the quantities given or something to that
ygData.messageBody:
I have tried with paper and quill in the concordance of research and I still
got the "These item did not combine in the quantities given" or something to
that effect.

-Shadowwalker

----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 9:20 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Practice Research


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 8/31/99 9:08:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
benh@...
> writes:
>
> > Basically I add Bat Wings, Bone Chips, and Lapis Laluli (sp?) to the
> > Concordance of Research and hit combine. It says these items do not
> combine.
> > I have tried it with the quill and paper in my inventory (not that I
needed
> > them with REAL research).
>
> now I have not done it. So do not quote me...
>
> But I think I hear that for the Practice Research... you need the quill
and
> paper in the Concordance.
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder.
